labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord fails to turn off the webcam, leaving it and the activity light on.
data.expected_result: Discord should recognize that you're no longer in the call on that device and turn off the webcam appropriately.
data.short_description: After connecting to a call from another location, Discord doesn't turn off webcam properly.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start up a call - Open Discord on another device or in another window - Connect to the same call
